mapper.update: /* ncis.sql.cmn.rnIpBnd.updateRnIpBndInfo */ UPDATE RN_IP_BND SET IP_BND_NM = #{ipBndNm} /* IP대역명 */ , USE_YN = #{useYn} /* 사용여부 */ , SUBNET_MASK = #{subnetMask} /* 서브넷마스크 */ , GTWY_IP_ADDR = #{gtwyIpAddr} /* 게이트웨이IP주소 */ , UPDT_USER_ID = #{updtUserId} /* 수정자ID */ , UPDT_DTTM = now() /* 수정일시 */ , NET_CL_CD = #{netClCd} /* 망ID */ , VLAN = #{vlan} /* VLAN */ WHERE BND_SEQ = #{bndSeq} /* 대역SEQ */

/* ncis.sql.cmn.rnIpBnd.updateRnIpBndIpQty */ UPDATE RN_IP_BND SET ASGN_IP_QTY = (SELECT COUNT(IP_ADDR) FROM RN_IP B WHERE B.BND_SEQ = #{ipBndSeq} AND B.IP_STAT_CD = '01') ,UNASGN_IP_QTY = (SELECT COUNT(IP_ADDR) FROM RN_IP B WHERE B.BND_SEQ = #{ipBndSeq} AND B.IP_STAT_CD = '02') ,BLK_IP_QTY = (SELECT COUNT(IP_ADDR) FROM RN_IP B WHERE B.BND_SEQ = #{ipBndSeq} AND B.IP_STAT_CD = '03') WHERE BND_SEQ = #{bndSeq}
